   sphinx-quickstart on Wed Nov 23 18:53:33 2022.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Documentation for a Robot Surveilance Finite State Machine
===================================================================

This is the documentation for Salvatore D'Ippolito's solution to the first assignment of the Experimental Robotics Lab course. 

This solution follows the general architecture developed in this other project: https://github.com/buoncubi/arch_skeleton, this documentation's author will specify whenever elements from the arch_skeleton project are taken and used without modifications in this specific project.

.. toctree::
  :maxdepth: 1
  :caption: Contents:

  scripts
